Package com.agreeya.memoir.services

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AudioRecorderService
    Service for recording the human conversation
    CompilerService
    This service compile all the medias(photo,video and audio) of the trip into the Movie
    ControllerService
    Controller Service for handling the user command(start/stop and pause/resume trip) and starting the following two services 1) Dispatcher service for dispatching the audio/video/photo service randomly 2) Database service for storing the captured media information into the DB
    DispatcherService
    Dispatcher Service listen to the controller service for the command (start/stop) and based on the command it randomly starts the audio,video and photo service and stop the running trips
    FFMpegService
    This service deals with the media processing like 1) Concat Audios 2) Concat Videos 3) Photo to Video with silence 4) Photos to video with silence 5) Photo to Video with audio 6) Photos to video with audio 7) convert .wav to .mp3 8) Rotate Photo 9) Rotate Video 10) Audio with default photos
    InsertIntoDBService
    Service to store the captured media information into the database
    PhotoShotService
    Service to capture the photos from the front or back camera
    VideoRecorderService
    Service to capture the video from front or rear camera
